data.eml:eml: A new species of the leafhopper genus Apogonalia from Mexico (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Cicadellini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Felix, Márcio, Mejdalani, Gabriel (2006): A new species of the leafhopper genus Apogonalia from Mexico (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Cicadellini). Zootaxa 1237: 19-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172808
